text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Borsele | settlement_type = Municipality | image_skyline = OvezandeKerkje1.jpg | image_alt = | image_caption = Church in Ovezande | image_flag = Flag of Borsele.svg | flag_size = 100x67px | flag_alt = | image_shield = Coat of arms of Borsele.svg | shield_size = 100x80px | shield_alt = | image_map = Map - NL - Municipality code 0654 (2009).svg | map_alt = Highlighted position of Borsele in a municipal map of Zeeland | map_caption = Location in Zeeland | coordinates = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Netherlands | subdivision_type1 = Province | subdivision_name1 = Zeeland | government_footnotes = | governing_body = Municipal council | leader_party = ChristianUnion | leader_title = Mayor | leader_name = Gerben Dijksterhuis | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 2 | elevation_max_footnotes = | elevation_max_m = | elevation_min_footnotes = | elevation_min_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = | population_as_of = | population_density_km2 = | population_demonym = Borsselaar | timezone1 = CET | utc_offset1 = +1 | timezone1_DST = CEST | utc_offset1_DST = +2 | postal_code_type = Postcode | postal_code = 4430â€“4456 | area_code_type = Area code | area_code = 0113 | website = | footnotes = }} Borsele, Zeelandic: Bossele, is a municipality on the former island of Zuid-Beveland, Province of Zeeland, the Netherlands. About 23,000 people were living in Borsele in 2017. The Western Scheldt is to the south of the municipality. The north entrance of the Western Scheldt Tunnel is in Borsele. Borssele Nuclear Power Station is also in the municipality. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:Municipalities of Zeeland
